title: Is there any way that pixel 3 can support NTFS file system so that my pixel can easily connect?
content: I was trying to connect my pixel 3xl with my external harddrive but it won't support because it support FAT32 file system and the harddrive was NTFS system....so is there any way that pixel 3xl support NTFS file system so that my pixel can connect easily?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
